> <OLD>
>
> "We should do it with Nightlight First, after we restore her to her
> primitive self"said Perceptor"She is who are in the most imediate risk...
> ok"he said while he faced Staton and the others "I need your help... I need
> you to be my eyes... this place isnt designed to allow me do my job I'll
> tell you what to do and you will tell me what is going on with a wide
> detaill, the most insignificant thing could be vital. Our firts step would
> be delete both programs, the Predacon program is more agressive and
> posessive and I foresee that it would be the most problematic... The MAximal
> one may be corrupted or damaged... till her memories are restored and with
> them her bonds with maximals we must be carefull cause she wont know if we
> are enemies or foes... in your case anyway cause I doubt that she would be
> happy to see me. Start when you are ready..."

Legacy and Santon began looking over Nightlight's form, checking for
any last minute changes. They didn't seem to find any.

Meanwhile Bump stepped into the middle of the conversation between
Rodimus and Tuscon and the others. "We can begin the operation, but it
is time for the rest of you to leave." Bump took a moment to run
another scan of Tuscon and Rodimus, "Both of you will need time in a
recharge chamber to be at full capacity, but you can do that any
time."

Bumps frowned, "But we need to clear this room for our next patients."

(TAG)

Preston
